I am EduTech Bot, the B.Tech course advisor. Want to know more? Let me know how can I help you.
Re-enter your details...

1. Fee Structure                                                                                                                                                 
     i) If you opt for plain B.Tech, fees will be Rs. 35000/- per sem.                                                      
     ii) If you opt for any specialization with B.Tech, fees will be Rs. 50000/- per sem.                   
     iii) If you opt for B.Tech + M.Tech integration, fees will be Rs. 45000/- per sem.

2. About Uniform                                                                                                                                              
     It is necessary for all the students to wear the college uniforms every Monday. Rest all days 
     students can wear casuals.

3. Working Days                                                                                                                                           
     Every Monday to Friday.
Want to take admission? Provide your contact number and email id.

values.text: Please enter below your preferred branch.

And your email id.

Computer Science is the study of computers and computational systems. Common areas of study within CS include artificial intelligence, security, database systems, vision and graphics, programming languages, software engineering. The future in CS is promising. Choosing a career in this field will open the doors to many job opportunities like Web Developer, Cyber Security, Database Administrator, Software Developer, and many more.
Hang on! Our counselor will connect with you in a bit...

The study or use of systems (especially computers and telecommunications) for storing, retrieving, and sending information. After completing B-Tech in IT, students can seek jobs at almost all the major Multinational Corporations (MNCs) like IBM, Microsoft, Cisco, etc. Some of the job profiles are Computer Programmer, Web developer, Software Analyst, Software engineer, Information security analyst.
All of the applications which make our life easier and enjoyable such as Television, Radio, Computers, Mobiles etc. are designed and developed by Electronics and Communication Engineers.

values.text: Mechanical engineers design, develop, build, and test. They deal with anything that moves, from components to machines to the human body. mechanical engineering careers center on creating technologies to meet human needs.

Electrical and electronics engineering, the branch of engineering concerned with the practical applications of electricity in all its forms, including those of the field of electronics. Electronics engineering is that branch of electrical engineering concerned with the uses of the electromagnetic spectrum and with the application of such electronic devices as integrated circuits and transistors.
We are offering various specialization in Computer Science in collaboration with many companies.
